content: The Act titled "Life-Threatening Diseases Compassion through Combination Therapy Act of 2012" promotes the development of combinations of investigational new drugs for serious diseases by providing marketing exclusivity and priority review for significant drug combinations. The Act "Life-Threatening Diseases Compassion through Combination Therapy Act of 2012" allows the Secretary to designate a combination of drugs as significant if they have the potential to advance treatment for serious diseases.
